{"id":718559729,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"6 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1654830266,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"11 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/718559729/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"6.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int has[130];\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        int len = s.length(), ans = 0;\n        memset(has, 0, sizeof(has));\n        int left = 0, right = 0;\n        while(right < len){\n            has[s[right]]++;\n            while(has[s[right]] > 1){\n                has[s[left]]--; left++;\n            }\n            ans = max(ans, right - left+1);\n            right++;\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
